text:
Has anyone had success recently adding support for drag and drop modules on blog posts?

I found this thread that dates back to 2021, where you have to request access for it. Is that still the case?

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CMXUWUY5D/p1621592513013200>

I also found <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Drag-amp-Drop-functionality-for-Blog-Posts/idi-p/408909|this article> that says its now been delivered, however I cannot see anywhere in the documentation on how to achieve this.
It happens automatically, all themes were updated when it was released from beta. Have you tested to see if the DnD works?
<@U05CG3ZLZBM> not quit. You still can't use dnd_areas. Basically where every `{{ content.post_body }}`  is turns into a dnd_area and you can just drag module right into the blog content.
